description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMaster of Centaurs:
Your {RACE_Centaur}s' attacks deal 20% more damage and have an independent 10% chance to deal critical damage for each {RACE_Centaur} fighting on your side. This trait does not stack.
name: Sigil of the Centaur
